title: Respiratory Management — Supporting Ventilation
description: Learn assisted cough, secretion management, and prevention strategies. Practice skill demos and safety quizzes.

screens.title: Assisted Cough Technique
screens.body: Support the patient’s abdomen during exhalation to help clear secretions.

screens.question: Which device is used for secretion management in SCI patients?
screens.explanation: Suction machines are commonly used for secretion management.

screens.back: Regular chest physiotherapy and hydration reduce risk.

screens.prompt: How do you teach patients to manage secretions at home?
